3161.verse: هُدًى|A guidance|93|177|33$وَبُشْرَىٰ|and glad tidings|124|292|922$لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|for the believers,|133|217|923$

3162.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|111|20$يُقِيمُونَ|establish|88|127|5069$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|130|38$وَيُؤْتُونَ|and give|95|134|5070$ٱلزَّكَوٲةَ|zakah|86|125|441$وَهُم|and they|79|98|256$بِٱلْأَخِرَةِ|in the Hereafter|125|207|824$هُمْ|[they]|62|226|49$يُوقِنُونَ|believe with certainty.|169|251|50$

3163.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|76|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|102|20$لَا|(do) not|75|88|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe|94|107|35$بِٱلْأَخِرَةِ|in the Hereafter,|130|143|824$زَيَّنَّا|We have made fair-seeming|204|210|5929$لَهُمْ|to them|72|126|98$أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ|their deeds,|99|207|1459$فَهُمْ|so they|70|178|152$يَعْمَهُونَ|wander blindly.|119|173|128$

3164.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|90|51$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) the ones,|121|137|20$لَهُمْ|for them|76|92|98$سُوٓءُ|(is) an evil|90|106|7574$ٱلْعَذَابِ|[the] punishment|134|150|482$وَهُمْ|and they|79|95|256$فِى|in|48|56|89$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|the Hereafter|109|185|978$هُمُ|[they]|62|214|56$ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ|(will be) the greatest losers.|209|285|8427$

3165.verse: وَإِنَّكَ|And indeed, you|127|150|2246$لَتُلَقَّى|surely, receive|117|164|13100$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|142|4239$مِن لَّدُنْ|from [near]|95|142|8356$حَكِيمٍ|the All-Wise,|105|128|8357$عَلِيمٍ|the All-Knower.|122|122|8258$

3166.verse: إِذْ|When|57|63|1198$قَالَ|said|52|63|309$مُوسَىٰ|Musa|83|94|499$لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ|to his family,|105|116|11349$إِنِّىٓ|"Indeed, I|85|96|312$ءَانَسْتُ|perceive|88|99|11351$نَارًا|a fire.|59|70|140$سَـَٔـاتِيكُم|I will bring you|116|122|13101$مِّنْهَا|from it|63|71|246$بِخَبَرٍ|some information|132|147|13102$أَوْ|or|41|56|154$ءَاتِيكُم|I will bring you|116|131|11352$بِشِهَابٍ|a torch|85|100|13103$قَبَسٍ|burning|68|83|13104$لَّعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|137|193$تَصْطَلُونَ|warm yourselves."|140|140|13105$

3167.verse: فَلَمَّا|But when|82|88|141$جَآءَهَا|he came to it,|114|127|13106$نُودِىَ|he was called|110|123|11354$أَنۢ|[that]|60|73|655$بُورِكَ|"Blessed is|89|102|13107$مَن|who|50|63|76$فِى|(is) at|61|74|89$ٱلنَّارِ|the fire|68|74|410$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|112|1012$حَوْلَهَا|(is) around it.|111|126|5830$وَسُبْحَـٰنَ|And glory be|103|118|9300$ٱللَّهِ|(to) Allah|82|97|606$رَبِّ|(the) Lord|87|102|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|131|8$

3160.verse: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a clear Book

3161.verse: As guidance and good tidings for the believers

3162.verse: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].

3163.verse: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.

3164.verse: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.

3165.verse: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.

3166.verse: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves."

3167.verse: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is Allah, Lord of the worlds.

3168.verse: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

3169.verse: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear.

3170.verse: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful.

3171.verse: And put your hand into the opening of your garment [at the breast]; it will come out white without disease. [These are] among the nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."

3172.verse: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."
